code: import{Button,Row,Col,Card,Container}from'react-bootstrap';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BerandaProgramAlumni(_ref){let{programAlumni}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"beranda-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"beranda-title",children:"PROGRAM ALUMNI"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"custom-hr"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{className:"justify-content-center mt-4",style:{paddingTop:'10px'},children:programAlumni.map(program=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:4,className:"beranda-card d-flex justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{style:{width:'30rem'},className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{variant:"top",src:program.image,alt:`Image for ${program.title}`,className:"card-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:program.authorName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:program.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:program.content.length>100?`${program.content.substring(0,100)}...`:program.content}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"button-card",onClick:()=>navigate(`/detail-program-alumni/${program.id}`),children:"Baca Selengkapnya"})]})]})},program.id))})]});}export default BerandaProgramAlumni;
